c74object.name: bl.metro
c74object.digest: An extension over metro with jitter, smoothing and tap-interval features
c74object.description: An extension over metro with jitter, smoothing and tap-interval features.

method.name: bang
method.digest: Bang repeteadly to set a new interval (like a tap-tempo)
method.description: Bang repeteadly to set a new interval (like a tap-tempo).

method.name: int
method.digest: Toggle the state of the object
method.description: Toggle the state of the object.

attribute.name: smoothfactor
attribute.digest: Only has an effect if smooth is on and jitterfactor is higher than 0
attribute.description: Only has an effect if smooth is on and jitterfactor is higher than 0. Controls how much smoothing gets applied to the output intervals modulated by jitterfactor. Uses a one-directional slide algorithm.

attribute.name: interval
attribute.digest: Set the target interval of the output (before jitter)
attribute.description: Set the target interval of the output (before jitter)

attribute.name: jitterfactor
attribute.digest: (0...1) The amount of jitter (the modulation of the target interval) can be applied at every output
attribute.description: (0...1) The amount of jitter (the modulation of the target interval) can be applied at every output. A value of 1 means the next output interval can either be twice as short or twice as long as the target interval.

attribute.name: smooth
attribute.digest: Whether to smooth the momentary interval changes caused by jitter (controlled with jitterfactor) with a slide algorithm
attribute.description: Whether to smooth the momentary interval changes caused by jitter (controlled with jitterfactor) with a slide algorithm.
